Name: Jungle Juggle
About the game: Jungle Juggle The mission has been assigned! Your strategy skills are required to open the way and protect the truck to safe passage! Fight your way out of jungle, desert, mountains, rain and blazing wind to reach the last resistance of the evil dictator! Key Features: Reversed tower defense mechanics. Full screen and High definition art. Sneak in binocular mode to plan your strategy and stay ahead of the enemies. 6 troops with different abilities to deploy near the truck. 4 special items to use anywhere on screen. Campaign with 40 levels, full of enemies and traps! 12 achievements. Immersive levels Awesome military soundtrack.
Meta Title: Jungle Juggle: May 28, 2018, Seven Sails and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Jungle Juggle? Check out the release date (May 28, 2018), developer insights from Seven Sails, and a complete game summary.
